description: A few simple ingredients bring this buttery and lemony lobster together with a brittle coating.
name: Lobster with A Lemon & Parsley Crumb Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cloves garlic, peeled and finely diced
2 lobster tails, split in half lenghtways and sinue removed

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a non-stick pan to a medium heat and then add the butter.
Once the butter starts to melt, add the garlic and herbs for fry for 2 minutes and remove from the heat.
Combine the panko crumbs with the herbed butter, lemon juice and zest and cover the meat in the lobster tails.
Place the halved lobster tails in a large baking dish and then bake in the oven for 15 minutes or until cooked fully.
Remove from the heat and serve with a choice of sides.
